00030 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::CurlPostedData(){
00031   LOGI("Creating a posted data structure");
00032   customTimestamp=false;
00033   list=new PostedDataKeyList();
00034 }
00035 
00040 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::~CurlPostedData(){
00041   if (list)
00042     delete list;
00043 
00044   list=NULL;
00045 }
00046 
00051 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::addKey(const char* key){
00052   LOGI("Adding a key to the CurlPostedData list");
00053   if (strlen(key)==0){
00054     LOGW("Trying to add a empty key to the CurlPostedData list. Aborded");
00055   }
00056   else{
00057     list->push_back(key);
00058   }
00059 }
00060 
00065 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::debugKeyList(){
00066   LOGI("Debugging CurlPostedData key list");
00067   for(PostedDataKeyList::iterator iter = list->begin();
00068       iter != list->end(); iter++){
00069     std::cout<<(*iter)<<endl;
00070   }
00071 }

00081 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::setTimestamp(const char* key){
00082   LOGI("Adding an auto timestamp");
00083   if (!customTimestamp){
00084     time_t now=time(NULL);
00085     
00086     ostringstream o;
00087     o<<now;
00088     this->setValue( key, o.str().c_str());
00089   }
00090   else{
00091     LOGW("Setting an auto timestamp while a custom timestamp already exists");
00092   }
00093 
00094 }

00102 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::getValue(
00103                                                  const char* key){
00104   const char* ret;
00105   bool found=false;
00106   PostedDataMapIterator iter;
00107 
00108   // We iterates through the list
00109   for(iter = map.begin(); iter != map.end(); iter++){
00110     // We search the key
00111     if (strcmp(key, iter->first)==0){
00112       // We have the good key
00113       found=true;
00114       ret= iter->second.c_str();
00115       break;
00116 
00117     }
00118   }
00119   if (!found){
00120     string err="This key cannot be found ";
00121     err.append(key);
00122     LOGW(err.c_str());
00123     ret= "";
00124   }
00125 
00126   return ret;
00127 }

00136 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::setValue(const char* key, 
00137                                                   const std::string& val){
00138 
00139   string snew(val);
00140   LOGI("Setting the value of a key (std::string form)");
00141   setValue(key, snew.data());
00142 }

00150 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::getComputedData(){
00151   LOGI( "Computing posted data..." );
00152   PostedDataMapIterator iter;
00153   //  const char* key, val;
00154   ostringstream oss;
00155   bool first=true;
00156 
00157   // We iterates through the list
00158   for(iter = map.begin(); iter != map.end(); iter++){
00159 
00160     if (iter->second.length()==0){
00161       LOGW("A key has no value");
00162     }
00163     else{
00164       if (first){
00165         first=false;
00166       }
00167       else{
00168         oss <<"&";
00169       }
00170       oss <<iter->first<<"="<<iter->second;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   return oss.str();
00174 }
00175 
00184 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPostedData::setValue(const char* key, 
00185                                                           const char* val){
00186 
00187   LOGI("Setting the value of a key (const char* form)");
00188   bool found=false;
00189   //if the key exists in the list
00190   for(PostedDataKeyList::iterator iter = list->begin();
00191       iter != list->end(); iter++){
00192 
00193     if (strcmp((*iter), key)==0){
00194       LOGI("The key was found");
00195       if (strcmp("timestamp", key)==0){
00196         LOGI("Setting a custom timestamp");
00197         customTimestamp=true;
00198 
00199       }
00200       map.insert(PostedDataPair(key, val));
00201       list->erase(iter);
00202       found=true;
00203       break;
00204     }
00205   }
00206   
00207   if (!found){
00208     string warn="The key you want was not found : '";
00209     warn.append(key);
00210     warn.append("'");
00211     LOGW(warn.c_str());
00212   }
00213   //  debugKeyList();
00214 }
